title: Prayer Book of Cardinal Albrecht of Brandenburg
description: Prayer Book of Cardinal Albrecht of Brandenburg; Simon Bening (Flemish, about 1483 - 1561); Bruges, Belgium; about 1525 - 1530; Tempera colors, gold paint, and gold leaf on parchment bound between wood boards covered with red velvet; Leaf: 16.8 × 11.4 cm (6 5/8 × 4 1/2 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 19; J.
